title: Terraform
pageDescription: Terraform is an open-source Infrastructure as code (IaC) software created by HashiCorp. It allows users to define and expose data center infrastructure using a declarative configuration language known as the HashiCorp Configuration Language, or optionally JSON.
shortDescription: Terraform is an open-source infrastructure-as-code software created by HashiCorp
markdown: Terraform is an open-source Infrastructure as code (IaC) software created by HashiCorp. It allows users to define and expose data center infrastructure using a declarative configuration language known as the HashiCorp Configuration Language, or optionally JSON.
